description:
Age 10, Pisces, blood type A. Member of the Biology Committee.
His father is in charge of the Satake Rifle Squad. Because of this he has lots of experience with flintlock rifles, which were rare at the time. He idolizes Shousei, a rifle expert who works for his father. Shares a room with Danzou.
Source: Wiki
name: Satake Torawaka
